sentences.english: But technology is a much larger driver of the hollowing out than trade.

sentences.english: I come to the U. S. A. in order to study science and technology, but not to travel.

sentences.english: Chinese science and technology policy is an important part of Chinese science and technology system.

sentences.english: The second part of the paper is a route analysis, on the interaction between science-technology and political party governance.

sentences.english: They have already stimulated other groups to put forward their own manifestos for science and technology.

sentences.english: The universality that man presents in his relation with nature and that in his socia…

sentences.english: Nowdays, science and technology are growing in leaps and bounds, and knowledge economy has shaped it's small form.

sentences.english: The rapid development of science and technology reflects the status of Moism in the history of scientific culture.
